Overview  Package  Class  Tree  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES
Packages
xxl  
xxl.binarySearchTrees This package provides binary search trees like AVL- and red-black-trees.
xxl.collections Contains an alternatively collections framework and miscellaneous utility classes to handle with the Java collections framework.
xxl.comparators Provides some useful additional Comparators based on Comparator.
xxl.cursors This package extends the functionality of the classes Iterator and Enumeration.
xxl.functions Provides Functions, Predicates and Procedures as well as higher-order Functions.
xxl.indexStructures Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
xxl.io Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.
xxl.relational Provides an implementation of the relational algebra based on the Java-ResultSet-interface.
xxl.spatial Support and building-blocks for spatial, temporal, similarity algorithms and data types.
xxl.util This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package.
